description: A **custom field** defines an abstract field that admissions staff can use to store arbitrary data about an applicant.  The data itself is stored in a **custom field answer**.
title: Custom Field

___field_type.description: The type of data that this field stores.

___options.description: When `field_type` is `"select"`, this defines the list of allowed values for the field.  Otherwise, this is `null`.

___id.description: Unique identifier for this custom field.

___label.description: Human-readable name of this custom field.
